page.title: 20THE GLADSTONE ROAD AREA
page.content: In this area there are many houses, some are privately owned, some are council houses and many are sheltered homes for old people.Some of the houses were built at the turn of the century to house shoe workers.Others have been built in the last twenty years.Some people are quite poor and others very well off.There is a lot of unemployment in the area. There are a number of factories and warehouses in the area and some of the people work in these.There are a Lower a a Middle school in the area but there is no Upper school within easy reach of the community.Children are taken right across town by a free bus service or if they choose to go to a different upper school have to make a long journey to reach it.
